control.description: Current Weather On Home Screen toggle

control.visible: Control.HasFocus(5) | ControlGroup(500).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(540).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(560).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(570).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(580).HasFocus() | ControlGroup(590).HasFocus()

control.description: Set Music Video library entry point
Use WOL script to wake external sources

Set Music library entry point - Artists
Set Music library entry point - Albums
Set Music library entry point - Songs
Set Music library entry point - Top100Songs
Set Music library entry point - Top100Albums

Set Music library entry point - Singles
